data.title: Hackley School
meta_keywords: Hackley School for Boarding and day students
data.meta_description: Hackley School founded in 1899 is a co-educational college preparatory school located in Tarrytown, NY, United States. Hackley School enrolls boarding and day students with a total student enrollment of 833 in  day student grades K to 12th boarding student grades 9th to 12th
data.text: Hackley School founded 1899 is a co-educational private college preparatory boarding school located in Tarrytown, NY United States. Hackley School enrolls boarding and day students with a total student enrollment of 830 in day grades K to 12th boarding grades 9th to 12th.
